Dangerous Duo:  
North Korea & Syria
====================================

**North Korea** shipping chemical weapon supplies to **Syrian** government, according to a United Nations report reviewed exclusively by the New York Times.

Flip For More From NYT

card_2.cardText:
What NYT Reports
----------------

*   North Koreans spotted at chemical weapons facilities inside Syria.
*   Supplies include valves, acid resistant tile, & thermometers.
*   Syria’s apaymenta for chemical weapons supplies could help fund North Koreaas nuclear program.
*   Dozens of black market shipments: 2012-2017

card_3.cardText:
What You Should Know:
---------------------

*   NYT reporting on one United Nations report, that no other outlet has at the time of our writing.
*   UN would not comment to NYT.
*   UN report is not public, nor do we know if it will ever become public.
*   However, there is precedent for military relationship between North Korea & Syria.

North Korea & Syria
------------------------------

card_5.cardText:
Public Reaction To Report
-------------------------

*   Commander, U.S. Central Command, asked about report during congressional testimony; General Votel said he had not seen report, but had concerns about use/spread of chemical weapons inside Syria.
*   White House: “no comment” when asked about report during daily press briefing.
